mapper.select: SELECT t.*, NVL(AVG(pr.PR_STAR), 0) AS star_avg, si.S_COMPANY_NAME FROM PRODUCT_ITEM t LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_REVIEW pr ON t.P_PID = pr.PR_P_PID JOIN SELLER_INFO si ON t.P_SELLER_ID = si.S_U_ID GROUP BY t.P_PID, t.P_NAME, t.P_DESC, t.P_PRICE, t.P_DISCOUNT, t.P_POINT, t.P_STOCK_QUANTITY, t.P_DELIVERY_PRICE, t.P_REGDATE, t.P_SELLER_ID, t.P_PC_ID, t.P_IAMGE_LIST, t.P_IMAGE_MAIN, t.P_IMAGE_DETAIL, t.P_DETAIL_INFO, t.P_VIEW_COUNT, si.S_COMPANY_NAME HAVING t.P_NAME LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%' OR t.P_DESC LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%' ORDER BY P_PID OFFSET #{pageRequestDTO.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRequestDTO.size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_ITEM WHERE P_NAME LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%' OR P_DESC LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%' ORDER BY P_PID
